pathParameters.name: subscriptionId
pathParameters.description: Gets subscription credentials which uniquely identify the Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.

pathParameters.name: resourceGroupName
pathParameters.description: The name of the resource group within the user's subscription. The name is case insensitive.

pathParameters.name: subscriptionId
pathParameters.description: Gets subscription credentials which uniquely identify the Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.

pathParameters.name: resourceGroupName
pathParameters.description: The name of the resource group within the user's subscription. The name is case insensitive.

pathParameters.name: catalogName
pathParameters.description: The name of the data catalog in the specified subscription and resource group.
